welcome_message_body: "Welcome to River Falls, where charming small town vibes meet breathtaking natural beauty. Known for our scenic trails, vibrant culture, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Downtown Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Downtown Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Minneapolis-St. Paul International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Minneapolis-St. Paul International Airport, mainly serving low-cost and regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
